title: Koizora LaLaLa: Sora ga Boku ni Warau kara
original_name: 恋空ららら～空がボクに笑うから～
sinopse:
Sora has a bad day at school, getting a bad score on a test. Depressed she folds it and makes a plane of it, letting it fly away by accident. The one who catches the plane is Ruka, her classmate. From here their cute love story begins.

Included one-shots:
Kocchi, Muite, Sawatte.
Seinaru Yoru wa Watashi to Shinasai!
